name: Adult Red Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walking, 40 ft. climbing, 80 ft. flying
description: The Adult Red Dragon is a massive creature with scales that resemble molten lava and smoke billowing from its nostrils. It has large, bat-like wings, jagged spines, and an air of overwhelming dominance.
memorable: Among the most feared creatures in Dungeons & Dragons, it can decimate foes with its devastating fire breath and possesses a commanding presence in battle.
goals: Typically seeks to amass treasures and dominate any perceived threats to its hoard or territory.
relations: Often encountered alongside lesser draconic minions or other fire-themed creatures in volcanic environments.
environment: Commonly found in volcanic lairs, caves filled with treasure, or mountainous terrains.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage, incredibly high hit points, and powerful spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Potential overreliance on strategies involving high Dexterity rolls; average Dexterity may limit agility.
attacks: Can perform multiple melee attacks with its bite and claws, and delivers a devastating breath weapon in a fiery cone.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which deals massive fire damage in a sweeping area and can instill fear in its victims.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect foes even in darkness.
skills: Proficient in Intimidation, making it a terrifying presence both socially and in combat.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws up to three times a day.
The 'Boil Over' ability creates intense heat around it, dealing damage to nearby foes.
Can frighten enemies with its Frightful Presence, punishing those who oppose it.
The 'Cruel Tyranny' ability helps bolster allies, making them stronger in combat.
Legendary Actions provide additional options for retaliation and area control.
spellcasting: Can innately cast several spells including Command, Hold Person, Glyph of Warding, and Wall of Fire without needing material components.
